accountConfirmed: Your account has been confirmed, now you can log in.
enterEmailInstruction: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
networkError: There was an error during login.
noAccount: You do not have an account?
passwordResetLinkSent: A link to change your password has been sent to your email
registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please confirm your account via email.
introductionContent: Welcome to VideoBase! Our goal is to provide users with a platform for safe and enjoyable video content sharing. By using our application, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.
registrationAndAccountContent1: The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login information.
registrationAndAccountContent2: The user agrees to provide true and accurate information during registration.
contentPublishingRulesContent1: It is forbidden to publish content that violates the law, including copyrighted material, without the consent of the rights holder.
contentPublishingRulesContent2: It is prohibited to publish pornographic, violent, hateful, discriminatory content, hate speech, threats, or any other content that may be considered offensive.
contentPublishingRulesContent3: Content containing false information, misinformation, or misleading content is prohibited.
privacyContent: We respect the privacy of our users. Please review our Privacy Policy to learn more about how we collect, use, and protect users' personal data.
liabilityLimitationContent1: VideoBase is not responsible for content posted by users.
liabilityLimitationContent2: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates our rules without prior notice.
termsChangesContent1: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Any changes will be announced to users through appropriate communication channels.
termsChangesContent2: Continuing to use the application after changes are made signifies acceptance of the revised terms.
contactContent: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms, please contact us at videobase78@gmail.com
name: Name
messageSent: Your message has been sent successfully
deleteAccountTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. Please make sure you want to proceed.
